RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains Level 2 flux data from the Relativistic Electron and Proton Telescope integrated little experiment (REPTile)on board the Colorado Student Space Weather Experiment (CSSWE) CubeSat. Electrons and protons are measured in five energy ranges in units of differential flux (number/MeV/s/sr/cm²)including: E1: flux for electrons E= 0.5-1.63 MeV E2: flux for electrons E= 1.63-3.8 MeV P1: flux for protons P= 9-18 MeV P2: flux for protons P= 18-30 MeV P3: flux for protons P= 30-40 MeV Electrons from E3 are measured in units of integral flux (number/s/sr/cm²) for E>3.8 MeV. All flux, in units of number per 6 seconds, have been corrected for transmission and temperature noise. L is calculated using the IGRF magnetic field model. Geographic latitude, longitude and altitude (km) are provided.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the PI and NASA SPDF for the CSSWE REPTile data.

PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Laboratory for Atmospheric and Space Physics; Space Physics Data Facility
